statements: UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address = '0xAbCdEf0123456789', token_id = '123456' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE digital_assets SET asset_name = 'New Asset Name', trade_history = '{"timestamp": "2022-01-01", "price": 100}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address='0x1234567890' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE digital_assets SET trade_history='{"price":100,"timestamp":"2022-01-01"}' WHERE token_id = 'ABC123' AND blockchain_platform='Ethereum';
UPDATE asset_ownership SET owner_address = '0x123456789', creation_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE asset_trading_history SET trade_timestamp = '2022-01-20 15:30:00', trader_address = '0x987654321' WHERE trade_id = 2;
UPDATE asset_ownership SET owner_address = '0x123abc', creation_timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE asset_trading_history SET trader_address = '0x456def', trade_timestamp = '2022-09-16 12:45:00' WHERE trade_id = 3;
UPDATE digital_assets SET trading_history='Updated trading history' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date='2022-01-15 13:45:00' WHERE asset_id=3;
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address = '0xAbCdEf123', trading_history = 'Updated trading history' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_type = 'Transfer', transaction_date = '2022-01-15 15:30:00' WHERE asset_id = 2 AND owner_id = 3;
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address='0xAbcdef123456', blockchain_platform='Ethereum' WHERE digital_asset_id=1;
UPDATE asset_ownership SET ownership_end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE ownership_id=2;
UPDATE digital_assets SET owner_address = '0xAddress123', blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' WHERE digital_asset_id = 1;
UPDATE asset_ownership SET ownership_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE ownership_id = 3;
UPDATE digital_assets SET asset_owner = 'John Doe' WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE digital_assets SET asset_owner = 'New Owner' WHERE asset_id = 100;
UPDATE asset_trading_history SET trade_amount = 500.32, trade_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE trade_id = 200;
